table_description: Contains job position definitions including titles, salary ranges, required experience, and department associations.
use_cases: Check salary ranges for specific roles
Identify positions requiring specific experience levels
data_quality_notes: min_salary and max_salary are in IDR (Indonesian Rupiah) with DECIMAL(12,2) precision
Sample data includes 10 positions across 6 departments
Positions range from entry-level (1 year) to senior management (8 years experience)
Salary ranges vary from 5M IDR to 50M IDR per month

table_columns.name: position_id
table_columns.description: Primary key. Unique identifier for each job position.

table_columns.name: position_title
table_columns.description: Title of the job position (e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'HR Manager', 'Sales Representative').

table_columns.name: department_id
table_columns.description: Foreign key to departments table. References the department this position belongs to.

table_columns.name: min_salary
table_columns.description: Minimum salary for this position in IDR (Indonesian Rupiah) per month.

table_columns.name: max_salary
table_columns.description: Maximum salary for this position in IDR (Indonesian Rupiah) per month.

table_columns.name: required_experience_years
table_columns.description: Minimum years of experience required for this position.
